text: phir jab usane un striyon kee makkaaree kee baat sunee, to unhen bula bheja aur unake (aatithy) ke lie gaav-takiye lagavaaye aur pratyek stree ko ek chhuree de dee[1]. usane (yoosuf se) kahaah inake samaksh "nikal aa". phir jab un striyon ne use dekha, to chakit (dang) hokar apane haath kaat baitheen tatha pukaar utheen: allaah pavitr hai! ye manushy nahin ye to koee sammaanit farishta hai
